sub_topic: The Mandelbrot set and its fractal properties
message_1: What is the area of the main cardioid of the Mandelbrot set?
message_2:
The area of the main cardioid of the Mandelbrot set can be calculated using the formula:

Area = (π/4) * (2 - √2)

When you plug in the values and calculate, you get:

Area ≈ 1.50766 square units
